text.section:
In making the appointments required under this section, the Governor and the Department shall ensure that the Council is representative of:
All geographic areas of the State; and
All levels of education, including early childhood learning, elementary school, middle school, and high school.

section.section: The term of a member appointed under this section is 3 years.
The terms of members shall be staggered.
At the end of a term, a member shall continue to serve until a successor is appointed.
A member who is appointed after a term has begun shall serve for the remainder of the term or until a successor is appointed.

text.section: The Governor or the Department shall appoint a successor in the event of a vacancy on the Council.
From among the members of the Council, a chair shall be elected for a 3-year term.
A member of the Council may not receive compensation but is entitled to reimbursement for expenses under the Standard State Travel Regulations, as provided in the State budget.
